fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Royal Stab**: Select a player to stab during the night. The stab bypasses Basic defense. If the target survives, they will bleed and die the following night if not healed. (X uses: Infinite)
- **Tea Time**: Once per game, select a player to invite for tea. Both you and the selected player will be immune to all abilities that night and will learn each other's roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, **Royal Stab** will bypass Powerful defense and the bleed effect will bypass healing.
- **Tea Time**: If used on Tuesday or Friday, it can be used again later in the game.
- Immune to Roleblocks and Control on Tuesdays and Fridays.
- Leaves a distinct British-themed death note.
